code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./Sidebar.css';import logo from'../../your-logo.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=()=>{const location=useLocation();const menuItems=[{icon:'üìÖ',label:'Scheduler',path:'/'},{icon:'üë•',label:'Staff',path:'/staff'},{icon:'üí∞',label:'Sales',path:'/sales'},{icon:'üßë‚Äç‚úàÔ∏è',label:'Members',path:'/members'},{icon:'üìä',label:'Reports',path:'/reports'},{icon:'‚úàÔ∏è',label:'Aircraft',path:'/aircraft'},{icon:'‚öôÔ∏è',label:'Settings',path:'/settings'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Aeroclub Logo",className:"logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"sidebar-nav",children:menuItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:item.path,className:"nav-item ".concat(location.pathname===item.path?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-icon",children:item.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-label",children:item.label})]},item.label))})]});};export default Sidebar;
